{"metadata":{"objective":"Write a strong topic sentence","lastStepAudioPath":"summary","audioPath":"CS16/2/Refresher"},"steps":[{"headerText":"","leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-cktitle\" style=\"color:#025B5B;font-family:lato,sans-serif;font-size:22px;font-weight:bold;\">The vacation that wasn&#39;t</span><br /><br />You are working on a one-paragraph letter to the manager of the Gravel Mountain Motel.&nbsp; After a really bad experience there, you want your money back.<br /><br />You know that your paragraph must convince the manager how terrible the experience was in order to get her to agree to a refund.&nbsp;<br /><br />You have identified your audience and purpose.&nbsp; Now you need to know how to begin with a strong topic sentence.<br /><br />Note:&nbsp; For an essay, your paragraph may be different.&nbsp; <img alt=\"\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" />See the mini-lesson on <em>Body paragraphs for an essay</em> for more information.</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain ju-tight\"><tbody><tr><td><p>Dear Gravel Mountain Motel Manager,</p><p><span class=\"marker\">How should I begin??</span></p><p>Please refund the cost of our hotel room as soon as possible.</p><p>Sincerely,<br />Ticked-off Traveler</p></td></tr></tbody></table>","settings":{"showHeader":0,"showAudio":1,"audioPath":"1","hideRightPanel":0,"showNext":1,"delayStep":"0","delayRight":"0"}},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":"0","delayRight":"0","audioPath":"2"},"leftText":"<p>A topic sentence gives the<strong> </strong>main idea of the paragraph.&nbsp; It is often the first sentence in the paragraph.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <img alt=\"A diagram shows the 3 parts of a paragraph. The first part is the topic sentence. The second part is the supporting details. The last part is the concluding sentence. \" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":"What is a topic sentence?"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"3"},"leftText":"<p>A topic sentence has two parts:<br /><br />It includes the <strong>topic</strong>, which answers the question <em>What is this paragraph about?</em><br /><br />It also includes the <strong>main idea, </strong>which answers the question <em>What does this paragraph explain about the topic?</em><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Topic:</span></p><p>Cooking classes in public schools.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Main idea:</span></p><p>This is a good idea for students in the third grade and above.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"4"},"leftText":"<p>When you put the topic and main idea together to class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Topic and main idea with additional details:&nbsp; </span></p><p>Providing cooking classes in public schools for students in the third grade and above will help students develop skills that relate to math, nutrition, and independent living.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"5"},"leftText":"<p>Suppose you are writing a paragraph in favor of a skateboard park.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<div><div><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Topic:</span></p><p>Building a skateboard park in our town.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Main idea:</span></p><p>It is a good idea to build a skateboard park in our town.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Topic sentence:</span></p></div></div><div><div><div><div><p>If we build a skateboard park in our town, kids will have opportunities to socialize and exercise in a supervised, safe place.</p></div></div></div></div>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"6"},"leftText":"<p>Your topic sentence should tell about something that you can prove, show, or explain.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Topic sentence:</span></p><p>The state of Maine offers plenty of activities for people who love the outdoors.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Can it be proved, shown, or explained?</span></p><p>There is lots of information that you can use to <em>show</em> the many outdoor activities that people can do in Maine.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"7"},"leftText":"<p>Suppose you are writing about your grandmother.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Topic sentence:</span></p><p>There is no one like my grandmother.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Can it be proved, shown, or explained?</span></p><p>No.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Better topic sentence:</span></p><p>My grandmother was a woman with great courage.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":"0","audioPath":"8"},"leftText":"<p>To write your own topic sentence, ask yourself,<br /><br />1.&nbsp; What am I writing about?&nbsp; That is your topic.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">I am writing about:</span></p><p>my stay at the Gravel Mountain Motel on October 15, 2015.</p>","headerText":"Deciding what a topic sentence should be"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":"0","audioPath":"9"},"leftText":"<p>2. What do I want to say about it?&nbsp; That is your main idea.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">I want to say:</span></p><p>This experience was bad because of the poor quality of the motel and the poor service.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":"0","audioPath":"10"},"leftText":"<p>Put the topic and main idea together and add details that help your reader understand what you will write about to create your topic sentence.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Complete topic sentence:</span></p><p>My stay at your motel on October 15, 2015 was a terrible experience for my family and me because of the poor quality of the motel and the poor service.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"11"},"leftText":"<p>Is your topic sentence about something that you can prove, show, or explain?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>Yes!&nbsp; You have more than enough information to<em> prove</em> that the motel had poor quality and service.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"12"},"leftText":"<p>If the topic sentence only states the topic, it will be too general.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Too general:</span></p><p>I stayed at your motel on October 15, 2015.</p>","headerText":"Focusing the topic sentence"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"13"},"leftText":"<p>Adding more information will help narrow the topic.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Better but still too general:</span></p><p>My stay at your motel on October 15, 2015 was a terrible experience for my family and me.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"14"},"rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Too narrow--you will be writing about more than just the beds!</span></p><p>My stay at your motel on October 15, 2015 was a terrible experience for my family and me because of the uncomfortable beds.</p>","leftText":"<p>You can add too much information, or information that is too detailed!&nbsp; Such writing will make your topic sentence too narrow.<br />&nbsp;</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"15"},"leftText":"<p>Try to add enough information to narrow your topic and help your reader understand what you will write about in this paragraph.&nbsp;<br /><br />Think of it as a hint for your readers about what you will cover in your paragraph.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Topic sentence that tells your reader everything that you will be writing about:</span></p><p>My stay at your motel on October 15, 2015 was a terrible experience for my family and me because of the poor quality of the motel and the poor service.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"16"},"leftText":"<p>Suppose you are writing about a bad meal at a restaurant.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Too general:</span></p><p>I did not enjoy my meal at your restaurant.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Too narrow:</span></p><p>I did not enjoy my meal at your restaurant because the burger was overpriced.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Just right:</span></p><p>I did not enjoy my meal at your restaurant because of the menu, the service, and the prices.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"17"},"leftText":"<p>Now you are writing about whether kids should wear uniforms to school.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Too general:</span></p><p>Many kids wear uniforms to school<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Too narrow:</span></p><p>School uniforms can save parents money.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Just right:</span></p><p>School uniforms are a good idea because they save parents money; they eliminate inappropriate attire in classrooms; and they reduce peer pressure to dress a certain way or to buy expensive clothing.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"18"},"leftText":"<table border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-powertip\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">ASK YOURSELF: Writing a topic sentence<span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\">&nbsp;,</span></th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><p>To write a good topic sentence, ask yourself,</p><p>1.&nbsp; What do I want to write about?&nbsp; This is your <strong>topic</strong>.</p><p>2.&nbsp; What do I want to say?&nbsp; This is your <strong>main idea</strong>.</p><p>3. Does the reader have enough information to understand what the paragraph will be about?</p><p>4. Can I explain, show, or prove my ideas?</p><p>Put it all together to make a strong topic sentence.</p><p><img alt=\"\" src=\"/images/picture_it.png\" style=\"width: 27px; height: 27px;\" />&nbsp; <a href=\"S3_BUCKET_/CS16/2/AskYourself_Topicsentence.pdf\" onclick=\"window.open(this.href, '', 'resizable=yes,status=no,location=no,toolbar=no,menubar=no,fullscreen=no,scrollbars=no,dependent=yes,width=1000,left=100,height=750,top=50'); return false;\">Ask yourself: Writing a topic sentence, Picture it!</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href=\"S3_BUCKET_/CS16/2/Screen_reader_ask_yourself_writing_a_topic_sentence.html\" target=\"_blank\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/images/accessible_icon.png\" style=\"width: 17px; height: 20px;\" /><span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\">Screen reader version of Ask yourself: Writing a topic sentence, opens in a new tab&nbsp;</span></a></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Putting it all together"},{"settings":{"showAudio":0,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":""},"leftText":"<p>Here is your letter with the beginning of your convincing paragraph!<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain ju-tight\"><tbody><tr><td><p>Dear Gravel Mountain Motel Manager,</p><p>My stay at your motel on October 15, 2015 was a terrible experience for my family and me because of the poor quality of the motel and the poor service.</p><p>.</p><p>.</p><p>Please refund the cost of our hotel room as soon as possible.</p><p>Sincerely,<br />Ticked-off Traveler</p></td></tr></tbody></table>"}],"overviewHeader":"Overview"}
